website_summaries.verdict: If your dog prefers jerky treats, there are less costly brands on the market but you won't find one made with higher-quality ingredients.
pros: Soft, natural, and versatile – a great jerky treat for almost any dog, from puppies to adults
Made with real lamb, fruit, and vegetables – no animal by-products
Consumers say they are the perfect treat for training
cons: A bit pricey, considering the bag contains only 6 ounces
The smell isn't very pleasant to humans, but dogs don't seem to mind

customer_reviews.title: The only treats for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: Zuke's now has the distinction of being the only producer of treats I now give my dogs. They are slightly more expensive than others, but well worth every penny. In the past, I've found some treats can make one of my dogs slightly ill - he has a sensitive stomach - but these, without fillers or artificial ingredients he has no trouble with at all. I hate to say these are "people food" but they basically are: people could eat these if they had to, so in that sense, the dogs are getting something equivalent to "people food". Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Good for training
customer_reviews.text: My dog love these, but to be fair she likes everything ,so if you have a picky dog I cannot help. I live these treats because they are soft enough to be brake into smaller pieces without crumbling, which makes them great for training. The bag is small and they are pricey, as I said I used them for training (i use different treats depending on difficulty of task to be learned) . I prefer these versus Zuke mini treats.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the occasional treat
customer_reviews.text: I love Zuke's as they are made in the U.S. and contain higher quality ingredients than some other brands out there. Our dog has never turned down a Zuke's treat and seems to really enjoy the flavor of these jerky bites in particular. They are a good size for larger breeds (our dog is about 70lbs) and to use as an occasional treat.
customer_reviews.author: Laura N.

customer_reviews.title: They are a pair of miniature schnauzers and they love these treats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are so spoiled!! They get treats when we get home from work and when they get up in the morning. They are a pair of miniature schnauzers and they love these treats, but what dogs wouldn't love soft, flavored treats multiple times in a day. I currently get these treats shipped monthly along with several other Zuke's treats because my dogs seem to cater to the flavor and consistency plus the fact that my dogs have to watch the amount of protein they ingest and Zuke's treats are on the low side of the protein ladder. I have been giving them to my dogs for about 6 months and will continue.
customer_reviews.author: volksman

customer_reviews.title: ... time rating dog treats because my dog is a garbage disposal. She'll eat anything and everything
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time rating dog treats because my dog is a garbage disposal. She'll eat anything and everything, including tissues and flowers. So saying she enjoyed these is moot. It was food, good enough in her eyes. For me, the smell wasn't too bad on these so opening the bag wasn't a blast in the face of horrible protein smell. They broke up into smaller bits easier for when I needed to refresh training lessons. The zipper part of the bag broke off from the bag portion so that was a slight bummer. Nothing a clip can't fix.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Had Difficulty Chewing the Treats
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my puppy (3 months old) did not enjoy Zuke's Jerky Natural Bites Dog Treats. At first he appeared to like them but I did notice he had a difficult time chewing them. However, since he did not appear to care for Zuke's because later refused to eat them, I decided to try Triumph Dog Turkey, Peas and Berries Jerky which he loves. Since it is a dog treat, I cannot tell exactly why he did not care for them but his refusal to eat them was a good sign. I believe they may have been too difficult for him to chew, but I can't be exactly sure.
customer_reviews.author: S.Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Please  do not send an old package that’s been sitting around for a while and it gets stale.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been giving this product to my dog for years and it’s very tender and nice, And he loves it. But this time when it arrived A week or eight days later the product was very hard to even break in half felt very old and he wasn’t excited to taste.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zellers

customer_reviews.title: Not jerky
customer_reviews.text: This is billed as jerky. It's playdough consistency. It's a shame zukes is no longer making pure NZ. This is definitely not a substitute for it. Pup won't even try it ... smells it and turns her head...in dog language that means yuck!
customer_reviews.author: Paula H.

customer_reviews.title: No Wheat, No Grain, No Problems :)
customer_reviews.text: Perfect treat for our little pup. He's just an 8 lb Yorkie so what I do is cut these Zukes into 4's. Real great for training or just a nice little snack for him. We have been buying these for a few years and our dog doesn't get tired of them. We alternate between the Tender Beef and the Lamb ones. It's great that these are wheat and grain free. They are super soft to break in half but just remember to zip the bag shut. We once left the bag open and a few of them got hard but no issues as our dog still ate them. Great product and I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo-chan

customer_reviews.title: These are the best Dog Treats!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is OBSESSED with these treats. Seriously, they are his favorite ever and he gets overly excited when we give them to him. They are natural well made and grain free treats which I can feel SO good about giving to my dog. I found Zuke's on my own but honestly I recommend to everyone because all their treats are amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith B

customer_reviews.title: Great NATURAL treats!
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs love these little treats. We've been using them for a couple of years with great success. We used to give them a treat that rhymes with pepperoni, but our toy fox terrier started vomiting after eating her small portion. She has never been sick eating ZUKES! The natural ingredients make it a great choice for all dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Not jerky texture
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like these just fine, but with a product called jerky, I thought they would be, well, more like jerky- drier and chewier. These are moist and soft and bite size so it's an immediate grab and swallow from my dogs (all 25 lbs and smaller). Don't think you're buying a jerky product with this.
customer_reviews.author: ald

customer_reviews.title: Lab loves them
customer_reviews.text: I'm constantly looking for healthy dog treats that are not crazy expensive. These are one of the better deals I could find when considering cost/ounce. My Lab absolutely loves them and they are good for him too. The treats are soft and moist, which is a plus for my dog. They could easily be broken into smaller pieces, but I generally just give my dog a whole one when he does something good. I wouldn't keep them in my pocket because they do smell a bit. It's not an overly offensive smell, but strong enough that you don't want to carry it around with you all day. I definitely recommend these for all dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite choice of all five dogs here.
customer_reviews.text: I'm always trying to be sure my five dogs eat the healthiest treats I can find. We've been feeding various Zukes treats for a couple of years with no worries. They have no corn, soy or wheat and smell meaty to my nose. The little squares are soft enough for my senior dogs to eat easily. No oily residue is left on my fingers or in my pockets if I carry a few on walks. You can easily break these in half for toy breeds.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs & Horses

customer_reviews.title: Expensive in my opinion but dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd and mini-Doxie both love these treats and they haven't become noticeably sick from eating them. I gave it three stars because they're so overpriced in my opinion. My Shepherd barfs up Greenies and I am always looking for something she will tolerate without busting my budget. She seems to do best on the super cheap biscuits but I would prefer something healthier and that's why I bought these. Because the dogs love them, I'll probably buy them again eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Blind Dad

customer_reviews.title: My dogs all very much enjoy these treats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs all very much enjoy these treats. We have a 5lb dog, 30lb dog, and 50lb dog and they all go nuts for them. I like that I can read all of the ingredients. Personally, I think the treats stink but that usually means the dogs get more excited about them.
customer_reviews.author: ChinersTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: They are a part of our morning routine before her walk and just enough to get her going to explore the great outdoors! Thank you to Zukes who has yet ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog just loves these; in all flavors! And the fact they are low in calories is an added bonus! They are a part of our morning routine before her walk and just enough to get her going to explore the great outdoors! Thank you to Zukes who has yet to produce a product my dog does not enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila C. Kline

customer_reviews.title: the ONLY treat my little cavachon will eat. He ...
customer_reviews.text: the ONLY treat my little cavachon will eat. He is SO picky and when I found these I put them on subscription to keep the bags coming. update 10/13/2017 my dog became sick each time I gave the new batch of these treats to him. Once I stopped the treats he has not thrown up at all. The throw up was definitely from these treats. something has changed and I am stopping my subscription. I notice that two years ago something similar happened . Read the reviews. I am changing my 5 stars to 1....poor quality control
customer_reviews.author: letsgoplaces

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these... but they also love panties, socks, cat turds, and rotten roadkill so I don't take my culinary cues from them. I'm no expert on dog treats so I can't speak to how nutritious these are... I chopped these up into much smaller pieces on a cutting board and used them as training bits. The shape lent itself well to being cut down further and they didn't crumble into useless tiny pieces like other soft meat-like dog treats when I did so.
customer_reviews.author: bluewandersTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: The only packaged treats my dog will eat.
customer_reviews.text: I have a chihuahua who is terribly spoiled by my grandfather. There are many times when the dog eats better than his human relatives. It's obviously tough to get a dog used to eating whole salmon, burgers, zucchinis, steaks, etc., to eat packaged treats, most of which contain only minimal "food" ingredients. By that I mean most packaged treats are filler. These are different. He devours them as soon as they land in front of him! I know (most of) the ingredients, and I'm confident he can taste it's akin to human food. Great treats
customer_reviews.author: JboneCA

customer_reviews.title: mini poodle approved
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a mini poodle (was supposed to be a toy poodle when purchased but that's neither here nor there and really in the grand scheme of things she was a bargain because I did get more than I paid for). She LOVES these. I only give her one a day as a treat for going into her overnight crate and she RUNS to her crate every night and waits so anxiously for this treat. Its never given her any stomach upset.
customer_reviews.author: Dang

customer_reviews.title: Border collie approved
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, Zuke's is a beloved brand in our house. We love that they don't have that stinky dog treat smell. Our border collie LOVES the jerky treats, particularly the lamb ones, because they taste so good. He'll even go get the bag out of the cupboard and bring it to us so he can have more. These are his second favorite Zuke's treat (after the salmon bites). I also like that this is a US company with a great reputation so I don't have the worries on recalls that some of the other brands bring.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Low calorie! Perfect for training because you don't have to worry about giving your dog too many!
customer_reviews.text: I love Zukes! Their products are a little on the expensive side, but well worth it because they are healthy! These are low in calorie and perfect for training my pup! He loves the taste! I take a few with me on our 30 minute walks just to give him a little snack here and there!
customer_reviews.author: *Pearl

customer_reviews.title: chewy dog treat
customer_reviews.text: We bought a range of high recommended (by Amazon reviews) reasonably priced treats, and our pup likes very few of them. I believe the reviews, it's just impossible to tell what your particular pet will like or not. This is actually one of his favorites, in that he won't just let it drop to the ground and walk away. He will take it and chew on it for some time. I like that he doesn't just gulp it down, the chewiness factor works for me. They are quite large for our small dog and I've cut them into quarters.
customer_reviews.author: amf0001

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: My picky dog likes them. Package arrived right on schedule. Everything was undamaged and in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie L

customer_reviews.title: Thank you, Zuke's, for having chicken-free treats. ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, Zuke's, for having chicken-free treats. One of our dogs is highly allergic to chicken, and chicken is in almost everything for dogs. Even foods and treats that tout other meats on the front of their labels have chicken somewhere in their ingredients. All three of our dogs practically drool with anticipation when it's snack time.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hovis

customer_reviews.title: Zukes are the best dog treats ever!
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I don't really love these -- my dog does!! Zuke brand treats are the only treats I give her and she would do anything at all for a Zuke!! This "style" of treat is a bit bigger than the usual training treats I give her (she's a JRT) but I keep them in my office and my car in case I see larger dogs and once in a while will also give her one.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my dogs favorite treats when we are training. I do not give her the whole treat at once, I break it into about 3 pieces while she is small. She is excited and willing to work when she smells them in my pocket! Have purchased these several times.
customer_reviews.author: cm_grand

customer_reviews.title: Dog love these treats.
customer_reviews.text: Great treats for dogs with food allergies. Very easy to break up into smaller pieces.
customer_reviews.author: satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but not fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I gave these treats four stars rather than five stars because my Maltese and Cocker Spaniel liked these treats, but they did not love them. To get rid of the few remaining tender lamb pieces, I had to mix it in their food. I liked Zuke's rectangular treats because of their softness. I could easily use my hands to break the treats into smaller pieces.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: The first ingredient is beef and they're made in the USA. The company also contributes a portion of their sales to the Dog and Cat Cancer Fund (according to the packaging). My Keeshond-mix loves these treats and I love giving them to her. I can easily break them in to smaller pieces if I want to make them last a little longer (or fit them into her Kong treat toy). The price is pretty good as well as far as dog treats go. I will continue to order this product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: VanetiaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Buster loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Buster is a recovering shelter dog, and a little picky in his eating sometimes. I've tried a lot of food/treats, and some things he won't eat at all or is allergic to. (Note: he has no problems with steak that I've seen, lol) The Zuke's line of products are now his favorites; I've tried several items in the Zuke's line, and he loves all of them. The Jerky Naturals Lamb has a strong smell, (thus a strong flavor too, I guess) and he really goes for that. USA made too, so all in all, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyR

customer_reviews.title: My super picky dog loves these treats immensely
customer_reviews.text: My super picky dog loves these treats immensely. I would definitely recommend for anyone with picky treat takers out there.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: my 4 dogs really like these
customer_reviews.text: My 4 dogs really like these, and they seem healthier than most dog treats. Great for training or little rewards when they are all cooperative.
customer_reviews.author: JED

customer_reviews.title: Great treats!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely LOVES these treats, more so than any other we give him! I swear if he could talk he would ask for them by name. On top of that they are grain-free and contain real ingredients. I like that they are soft and easy to tear, we tear them into fourths when we use them for training. This price is the best that I have seen too, I ran out recently and stopped at a feed store and they were $3 more for the same size bag.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves Zuke's treats
customer_reviews.text: Our dog highly enjoys all the Zuke's treats we've bought for training purposes. I buy several different bags, and mix small portions together to keep her interest with the different flavors during classes and walks. I cut these into smaller pieces since she doesn't need the entire treat for her size, but the flavor is great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Big dog loves the big smell and taste!
customer_reviews.text: Although they have a strong odor that isn't appealing to the humans in the house, our big dog loves, loves, loves them! They make great training rewards. Have put this on our reorder list!
customer_reviews.author: Happy2BeMe

customer_reviews.title: My doggie says yummy!
customer_reviews.text: My doggie loves eating this every morning. From reading the ingredients, it must be of good quality and of good health for my furbaby!
customer_reviews.author: JuzMe

customer_reviews.title: Good price but the picky dog knows it
customer_reviews.text: The price is right on these, but my yorkshire terrier won't eat them. She's had Milo's and Skinny Mini's you see, and after those, these just won't cut it with her. They only work if she is starving, and she just looks at you like "alright, I guess I'll help you get rid of them", chewing slowly while looking around for a more desirable crumb that someone might have dropped.
customer_reviews.author: M. Murray

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats – they are meaty and stinky! They're also perfect for treat toys because of their square shape and softness, which makes them easy to put into most puzzle toys but harder for the dog to get out! :)
customer_reviews.author: chelksea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect treat
customer_reviews.text: These are great treats. I have two Pomeranians and they love them. The size is perfect, as I don't want to give them too much and cause them to gain weight.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Bianchi

customer_reviews.title: 5 out of 5 paws up.
customer_reviews.text: 5 out of 5 paws up. My dogs and foster dogs love these. All 5 are under 20lbs This will become a regular refill each month! I can cut the jerky squares into quarters, and it's perfect for them. They do like them better than the grain free jerky treats received from the other box place.
customer_reviews.author: TSC Awareness

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these, for some reason the soft ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these, for some reason the soft chewy texture of Zukes treats are irresistible for my dog. If presented with several types of treats side by side she always goes for the zukes treats first. I think these are the same as the minis cept larger format.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bond

customer_reviews.title: Liked being able to 1) find the item and 2) ...
customer_reviews.text: Liked being able to 1) find the item and 2) having it delivered to the house. Have not been able to use 1 bag/month so now have 2 bags in our pantry
customer_reviews.author: TK Engineer

customer_reviews.title: I like it better than my dog
customer_reviews.text: These are good treats, USA, so I bought them. Might be the lamb, I don't know, but they are not my dog's favorite. She eats them, but carrys them around for a while. I have no negatives on this item, it's just a matter of preference for her, I believe. She's picky with things and it might be that it's just something new. I don't think you could go wrong as far as quality seems to me, and a healthy recipe.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: ... dogs (who can be extremely picky at times) absolutely love these treats
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these multiple times now because my dogs (who can be extremely picky at times) absolutely love these treats. I try to always keep a pack in the house form them. They enjoy them so much they know the sound of the bag opening and come running. I haven't personally tasted them, but going by my dogs' reaction they must be delicious!
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Love this product when bought elsewhere (Petco)
customer_reviews.text: Love this product when bought elsewhere (Petco). They were moist and soft, and my dog loved them. Unfortunately, when purchased through Amazon, the product was hard and broke apart into dry bits, even though the expiration date had not yet passed. I am so disappointed because I wanted to subscribe to this item and have a package sent every month. I'm going to give it one more try one, but then may be going back to buying them in-store if the quality is still sub-par.
customer_reviews.author: StellaDiver

customer_reviews.title: Fido will be begging for more!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog devours these! We love that they are all natural without any fillers or added chemicals for our Fido. If your dog is like a family member, why not provide them with the healthiest options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Mamas_06

customer_reviews.title: A real hit with the Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love these. Dogs are small so I break them up to keep them from choking on the treats.
customer_reviews.author: Lightwine

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves Zuke's
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. I love the fact that they're all natural. My dog has food allergies and an autoimmune disease where he cannot eat any poultry products. I choose not to feed him any grains including wheat or corn. Zuke's fits the bill and he loves them. That's really all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Jennj99738

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves these treats!
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves these treats. They were delivered promptly and as advertized.
customer_reviews.author: Sword

customer_reviews.title: Great Product...Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this treat. I can break it into quarters easily and it becomes my "high value" treat when training. I also use it on the "come" command as a reward. My dog was a little stubborn with that and now comes when I call her. I hope you'll find this review helpful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Dovetail

customer_reviews.title: Safe, easy to chew, tasty (for dogs)
customer_reviews.text: I have a geriatric mini poodle. He can't chew biscuits or rawhide textures,but these treats are soft enough and still provide some workout for his gums and remaining teeth. I appreciate the fact that the ingredients are domestic and it is manufactured in the US.
customer_reviews.author: Paula the Gourmet

customer_reviews.title: Zuke's makes some of the best treats on the market
customer_reviews.text: Zuke's makes some of the best treats on the market - and we've tried a lot. I like these as an intermediary size, with the "filets" as a large treat and then the pencil eraser size ones for training. **I encourage you to read the ingredients on your dog treats.**
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I have a small 12 pound dog and she loves the Zuke's treats. These are little squares about an inch by an inch and they are soft and chewable, even for older dogs. My dog has pancreatitis and she's allergic to most treats due to her wheat allergies, but these treats have been great and she loves the lamb flavor. I'd recommend them to anyone who's dog love treats.
customer_reviews.author: DoodleBug

customer_reviews.title: My pups LOVE these!!
customer_reviews.text: I have two boxers and one of them is prone to allergies and these are their absolute favorite treat and they cause no issues for either of my babies...when they see me go to the cabinet, these treats are what they are hoping to see!!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: really good treats
customer_reviews.text: I like to put these in her Kong toy with the treats, it's neat to give her something to get early then I don't feel so bad when it takes 1//2 hour to get the Kong treats :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good dog treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes these treats. I buy her a variety of treats every month and these are one of the monthly purchases. She enjoys them and Zuke's seems to sell good quality treats. I will continue to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product makes my pup happy everytime
customer_reviews.text: The pup is pleased!! She loves her Zukes . I usually purchase the jerky treats and wanted to change it up. These treats are a hit. I can't complain, Zukes uses all natural high quality ingredients and it's only the best for my fur ball.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Castro

customer_reviews.title: My Pups Fave Snacks
customer_reviews.text: He LOVES EM & anything from the state he was born in gets high marks in his book.
customer_reviews.author: Amy  H Frechette

customer_reviews.title: Soft, but not enough
customer_reviews.text: Fan of Zukes for a while. Can’t give this treat a 5 star cause even though they’re soft, they didn’t seem soft enough. Nevertheless will try other zukes before riding again, but still up for debate about buying again.
customer_reviews.author: yalitze caballero

customer_reviews.title: Harlee's favorite of any of her treats
customer_reviews.text: Harlee's favorite of any of her treats. She knows what the package looks like and she is front and center sitting when she sees it come out. Love the natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Good for Daisy
customer_reviews.text: Daisy, my Chiweenie, loves these treats. Of course, I have to chop each into 6 little pieces because she is small (10 lbs), but it's worth it. Good for training - even with her Daisytude, she will do what I ask.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy-Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Doxie loves!
customer_reviews.text: My mini dachshund loves these- a great size for small dogs. I've been buying this brand for yrs w no issues.
customer_reviews.author: ChicShopr

customer_reviews.title: 👑 Fit for a King or a dachshund...
customer_reviews.text: These are my dachshund’s JAMMY JAM. He an obnoxiously, over the top picky eater. The palette of Kings apparently. And he loves these things!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: My dogs approve
customer_reviews.text: They love this brand and they love the jerky’s!!! I only buy these for special treats and they know!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly fernandez

customer_reviews.title: I really like all the Zuke products like these
customer_reviews.text: I really like all the Zuke products like these. They're chewy, so easy for the dog to swallow. I generally cut them in half for an even smaller treat. My dog really enjoys them too.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love Them
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old Bichon and 8 months old Goldendoodle love these things. I've purchased different kinds from this brand and have never had any that my dogs didn't scarf down. These do go SUPER quickly, though. A better price, or better yet, a larger amount per bag would be a huge improvement! But the product itself is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Pug Approved
customer_reviews.text: Got a picky 16 year old pug. She likes these. Ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Pug

customer_reviews.title: Great for a dog with a limited ingredient diet!
customer_reviews.text: We have a dog that is on a limited ingredient diet due to allergies, and these are his favorite lamb treats. My only complaint is that I can't buy a bigger bag.
customer_reviews.author: ast219Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A HAPPY FUR BABY!
customer_reviews.text: Lily, my fur baby, was the happiest girl ever when she had her first Zukes Jerky treat! I hadn't heard of this brand prior to this order, but rest assure Lily will be eating Zukes Jerky treats from now on. Happy dogs are the best companions ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have two dogs and only one dog liked the treats. So silly for me to purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Harmon-Schifferling

customer_reviews.title: Our mini Schnauzer LOVES Zuke's Jerky Naturals!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old puppy loves these, and has even learned how to "go to bed" in order to get his paws on one! Zuke's is quite a consistent brand, and our pup loves everything we have bought by this company so far. My husband and I like knowing we're giving him a tasty treat that's also natural and is made in America. Amazon usually has these for a little bit cheaper than most of the pet stores in our area, which is also nice!
customer_reviews.author: lololovesfilms

customer_reviews.title: Soft dogs treats, gread treat size.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Zuke's Jerky Naturals Dog Treats in Lamb and so do my two Chihuahuas. I typically break one of these in two and split them between my two dogs who are 7 and 9 lbs. They are nice and soft and stay like that in the resalable packaged, which is very much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: My 25 lb dog loved this product so much that he jumped on my bedside table to get more. It has rosemary, which I don't prefer the smell of, mixed with lamb. The best part of the product is its size: a perfectly reasonable 2x2 square for a small dog to snack on. Also, I get this product through Subscribe & Save, which is a nice plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Westie puppy loves this one. He got tired ...
customer_reviews.text: My Westie puppy loves this one. He got tired of zuke s training bites and it didn't work for obedience training. so I had to try something different. He is not fed up with jerky bites yet. I break the treat into smaller pieces for him.
customer_reviews.author: Jude Moon

customer_reviews.title: Pups love em!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these; also it's nice to be able to read the ingredients list and know they are eating quality food. I have two Boston Terriers (who are picky eaters) and they love the flavor and gobble them right up! However the name is a little deceiving, as the treats are chewy and moist.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Purina not trusted
customer_reviews.text: Never would have ordered if I had known Purina now owns company. Threw out!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta P.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these in Whole Foods when I was looking something a little more 'healthier' than Pupperoni. My dog (a puggle) is picky and has not liked other doggie treats with the exception of Pupperoni. As soon as she smelled them, she chomped on them pretty quick! I purchased these in Amazon as they are cheaper than Whole Foods.
customer_reviews.author: vince217

customer_reviews.title: my dog won't eat it
customer_reviews.text: Hard treat, difficult to break into smaller pieces, my dog won't eat it
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Zukes Products
customer_reviews.text: Love all Zukes products! My dog only has Honest Kitchen and Zukes snacks, because they are healthy and my dog LOVES them.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Job

customer_reviews.title: We have to stick to lamb for our dogs due to allergies and these are great to keep around
customer_reviews.text: My dogs drool when they here the package opening. They snap to attention and follow commands with enthusiasm for these treats. We have to stick to lamb for our dogs due to allergies and these are great to keep around.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: All good.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves loves loves these. A good size and tender but firm pieces that you can give whole or break in half. I like that thse are better made than most other treats.
customer_reviews.author: K R TTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Kaiser loves
customer_reviews.text: So i got all three flavors of the jerky naturals and they are a hit with our puppy kaiser .... all he has to do is hear the bag move and he is all ears and trying to find out what he can do to get a treat. ..... and if your not looking and have the treat bag down he sneaks off with them .... pretty cute to see him get so excited over a treat
customer_reviews.author: M.M.Komes

customer_reviews.title: Would not rebut due to size - waste of time cutting to right
customer_reviews.text: Did not care for the size of the treat - thought was too large and I had to cut up. Would not rebut due to size - waste of time cutting to right size
customer_reviews.author: stephanie lagow

customer_reviews.title: Loved and devoured by my pickiest dog
customer_reviews.text: Loved and devoured by my pickiest dog. Nice to see a 'jerky' treat in bite size. Added to my monthly subscriptions
customer_reviews.author: gooniegoogoo

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes them, but very rubbery
customer_reviews.text: My labrador puppy eats these treats (broken up) for training. They're not exactly jerky...more rubbery. She likes the Zuke's training minis way better, which are actually moist and not quite as rubbery.
customer_reviews.author: A. A. Zaiken

customer_reviews.title: Happy doggy
customer_reviews.text: I sometimes put these in a treat ball, & it keeps my dog occupied for a little while. She loves them. I also like that they are made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Karla C

customer_reviews.title: I appreciate the fact that this is a grain-free dog ...
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the fact that this is a grain-free dog treat, that also does not contain any chicken, which is important due to my dog's sensitivities. And of course she loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Christine D.

customer_reviews.title: my dog's favorite
customer_reviews.text: Take this review with a grain of salt because I haven't actually tried these. ;-) My dog loves them. She likes these more than the beef flavored ones they make.
customer_reviews.author: JP Johnson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TREATS
customer_reviews.text: I try to stick to all natural products in my household. That goes double for my dog. she is a super mutt with a strong stomach, but that doesn't mean I want to take any chances. these seem like quality treats and she really enjoys them. I have purchased several flavors and she loves them all. will definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell G.

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love these. They certainly have a smell that is appealing to me and clearly to the dogs as well. They are a bit pricey but if broken or cut into smaller pieces they make a great small treat. While we tend to mostly use Charlee Bear Dog Treats these are a great alternative just for variety.
customer_reviews.author: Nettie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Treats!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dog as he is on a grain free diet and I don't like a lot of junk in pet foods. I have also used these to give him pills. They are soft enough you can break them in half and put the pill between. If you buy them on Amazon they are more affordable. They are great treats and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl P

customer_reviews.title: Great treats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these and These are special treats for when I cut their nails. I have huskies that start crying when you put the nail cutters out. I think the only reason they let me do them is because they get these treats afterwards for being good!
customer_reviews.author: Devin S

customer_reviews.title: Great Made-In-America Dog Treats My Dog Loves!
customer_reviews.text: These Made-in-American Dog Treats are thick, meaty and moist (remember to reseal the zip-lock package every time you open it) and they smell great. My dog loves them. And I feel good giving them to him, knowing I'm avoiding all the problems with treats imported from China, as most of them are.
customer_reviews.author: T. Scruggs

customer_reviews.title: Great training treat
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended by 2 different dog trainers we worked with. The dog loves them and they are a good product without a lot of calories and without fillers. The dog loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Trw3

customer_reviews.title: Picky pug
customer_reviews.text: My pug loves these! They seem to help with her coat shine too!
customer_reviews.author: josh tody

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes them.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. They're soft. They smell like jerry but are more of a general treat. It's not like real jerky. My Yorkie loved them.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: Our Dog Loves Zuke'z treats
customer_reviews.text: We had been feeding our dog Wellness Puppy treats forever but the price keeps going up and the quality down so we decided to look elsewhere and we are glad we did. So far I have not have any problems with the quality of the treats, and our dog loves them. The price is also right so is a win win for us.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Healthy tasty treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the how these treats smell and taste - they are special treats for her. They're healthy, mildly chewy, low calorie treats so it's perfect. They are a good compliment to her regular chicken jerky treats (from Canyon Creek Ranch.) I usually divide each into 2 or 4 pieces while training.
customer_reviews.author: Tomboy Chic

product_meta.title: Zuke's Jerky Natural Bites Grain-Free Dog Treats
product_meta.description: Make the time you spend with your dog even more special when you feed him Zuke's Jerky Natural Bites Lamb Recipe dog treats. Real lamb is the first ingredient in this recipe, and these meaty bites are made with wholesome carrots, blueberries and apples, so you can feel good about the snacks you feed to your dog. We season every serving with turmeric and sage for added goodness. The tender texture and mouthwatering taste are sure to tempt him at snack time, while the small size makes these treats ideal for training. These dog snacks are crafted in the USA using the Earth's best ingredients, and they contain no mystery meats, by-product meals, artificial colors, flavors or added animal fat, providing you with a nutritious way to show your best friend how important he is to you. He'll appreciate the savory goodness found in every tasty bite of Zuke's Jerky Natural Bite Lamb Recipe dog treats, and you can rest easy knowing he's getting a nourishing addition to his daily diet.
feature_bullets: New Packaging, Same Trail-Tested Recipes. For A Limited Time, Packaging Look May Vary
Made With Carrots, Blueberries, Apples, And Savory Herbs
Healthy Treats Ideal For Use With Training
Contains No Mystery Meats, By-Product Meals, Artificial Colors, Flavors Or Added Animal Fat
